Theatre of Shadows: As You Wish With Guide 

Take a journey as a Hunter of Darkness in Theatre of Shadows: As You Wish! The Hunter of Darkness is wandering the Earth and answering the call of distress when evil invades where itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not welcome. His ring leads him to the Theatre of Shadows. There he meets the owner of the theatre, Donna, whose husband, Nicholas, is possessed by a dark force that came from a magic shadow puppet. Save Nicholas and capture the dark force before it releases dark shadows from another dimension!

Explore a city obsessed with evil shadows
Solve unique and interesting puzzles
Rich and fascinating gameplay
Includes the Strategy Guide!
